website_summaries.verdict: The best option if you're looking for a product that works without irritating your sensitive skin.
pros: Won't irritate sensitive skin or eyes
Gives you the look of lash extensions naturally
cons: It may be too expensive for some users
May take a couple of months to see results

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I've used Neulash several times before (bought thru Nordstrom & Amazon) and seen amazing results! This product however is a complete rip off and did! Came in a different bottle than advertised and isn't a liquid, it's a gel that literally won't come out of the bottle and when the tiniest bit does, it's clunky and makes it look like your eyelashes are crusty! I am so furious ($95 purchase) and wish I could get a refund in return for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbulyca

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it was just my bottle but I have bought the smaller bottle of this in the past locally and so I decided to go with the bigger this time and it seems empty to me, I can hardly get any on The applicator and if I’m out soon the the large more expensive bottle lasted several weeks less than the smaller bottle....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saw results fast
customer_reviews.text: I never thought it would work but I started seeing results within the first week. After about 3 weeks, I started getting compliments about my eyelashes so I know it is definitely working. It is making my lashes longer, not really thicker though but I think that is what the product claims so I am very happy and keep buying it when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neulash is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love Neulash. I swear by this item. After a terrible experience with eyelash extensions ( I was left with brittle, sparse lashes) I turned to Neulash. This product is outstanding. I get frequent compliments on my long lashes - even from my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: This product is an excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years now Due to that I have found excellent results from the use of this product as my eyelashes are short and thin Yes it takes a few weeks to see results but like everything else it’s worth the wait I will not attempt to try any other similar products out there in the market
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Old Product! Completely dried up!
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was so old there wasn’t any liquid inside of the tube. I ended up buying it from a legit retailer and the packaging is so updated, there’s even a new logo!
customer_reviews.author: brooke schultz

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: After couple of weeks of using it, I clearly saw the difference. After a month, I had twice as long eyelashes as I used to have! My eyelids got a little red and irritated though, so now I'm using it every other day or 2-3 times a week, but it still works. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: IG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not everything works on everybody. This did not do a thing. Not a thing. I don't think it would have even poisoned me if I drank the stuff. But who knows, may work on the next gal. It's a crap shoot with these kind of things.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This applies easily and doesn’t irritate eyes or skin. If you want thicker fuller eyelashes this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: I was debating whether to use latisse or try out neulash after hearing about it from my brow gal. I started using it about a month and can already tell I have longer lashes. They also just seem softer and healthier. The length so far is probably only something I can see but am curious how it will look in another month. I did have eye sensitivity and itching for about the first week but tried to ignore it. It eventually went away as my eyes got used to it. Very easy to apply. Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm. After 10 weeks, I could feel my lashes are a lot thicker and longer. It does require continuos use. Wish it were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: the product is okay. doesn't irritate it too much. application is fairly easy. i don't know if i see results yet, its been 2 months now using every other day.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: I love neuLash Enhancing Serum
customer_reviews.text: I love neuLash Enhancing Serum. I've tried other lash enhancing serums, but so far this is the best. I saw results after about two weeks. Lashes appear longer especially after applying mascara.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Fake, Fake, Fake. DO NOT!!! waist your money. Placebo to the cause. This was the very BEST waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Andante Dorough

customer_reviews.title: Minimal Result
customer_reviews.text: Quite overpriced considering the result wasn't great or good. I wouldn't recommend to anyone at the current price. If it were cheaper then maybe
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen any improvement yet but I have a friend who has had real lash growth. I'll keep using for a while to see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This product works! My eyelashes are much longer and I get lots of compliments on them. Pretty soon I won't even need eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: denisemiller

customer_reviews.title: Who needs Latisse
customer_reviews.text: Almost as good as Latisse without the red eyes and itching ! Lashes staying longer also. Try it you won't be disappointed. And u will save $$$
customer_reviews.author: Susan C Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great product.?
customer_reviews.text: This does increase your eyelashes! Have used before and will continue to order. This application is better than the othersy
customer_reviews.author: S. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: NEULASH=NEW LASHES
customer_reviews.text: I recently damaged my eyelashes from getting eyelash extensions and wanted to grow them back asap. they were short and i had gaps in between my lashes because there were no lashes there. it was embarassing because i couldnt use mascara or fake lashes. i used a number of products to make them grow back but none seem to work. the first 3 days of using neulash i noticed the lashes i did have were getting longer and the gaps were startingto grow lashes. two weeks later i had full eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kuilemuli

customer_reviews.title: Neulash
customer_reviews.text: This product did visible increase my lashes as well as my eyebrows. The bottle lasted nearly 6 months also it is easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Harmon

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt work at all - instead of making my lashes grow it made me feel itchy at night after a month in.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Hey Dallas

customer_reviews.title: FAB
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this for about 2 months and my lashes look gorgeous. They are longer and thicker. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: LNDChicago

customer_reviews.title: Barely works, LilLash worked way better on me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch brands and take a break from LiLash and see what else worked for a little cheaper. This worked some, but didn't take over from when I was using LiLash, so I had to wait a month before it even looked like my lashes were a bit longer. My lashes got a little longer but not thicker, and not half as long as LiLash did. For $85+ it wasn't worth it to me, I'm going back to LiLash.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh 888

customer_reviews.title: Neulash
customer_reviews.text: Results are amazing. My 48 year old mother is using as well and her eyelashes look extension eyelashes when it is real!
customer_reviews.author: Izabella

customer_reviews.title: Longest Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I tried other brands and Neulash is the best at making my lashes long and full. If you try it you will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I used everyday for 4 weeks and no results. I have used other products for 2 weeks and obtained great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: After using it for 3 weeks, I still see no results. It was costly and do not see results, I am disappointed. Maybe in a couple of weeks, I will see results. I used a much cheaper product and saw some results a lot sooner. I should have stayed with the less expensive product since it was working!
customer_reviews.author: JVB

customer_reviews.title: No Irritation
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is really doing much. I just wanted to add a little oomph to my already dark lashes. I think my lashes look good but I don't know how much they've grown since it happens gradually. The good part is that there is no irritation unlike some other lash enhancers I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as RX Latisse w/out possible side effects. Less $ also ! Worked quicker than i thought---lashes super long.
customer_reviews.author: Sanibel Sher

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: After 4 weeks I noticed no significant change but I am going to continue in hopes that the product just needs a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mananitas

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Your lashes continue to grow with the use of this product. Kim Kardashian long! The only downfall is when you stop using it, your lashes go back to regular. Quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: I can see a difference, but not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I had extension and wanted to try this product due to the no side effects. I did see more lashes fill in, but the length after two months of regular use has not changed. I will probably try one of the other products after I finish with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it claims to do. With daily use my lashes grew to the point they reach the lenses on my glasses which was unexpected. My lashes were never long or dark before neulash. The color hasn't really darkened but they have grown. I can go every other day now with good results. I'm just kind of committed to neulash because I want to keep my lash length. If there are any adverse long term effects I'll find out! For now neulash is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: amazing product! buy through different seller
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past (purchased elsewhere) when applied nightly as recommended my lashes grew like mad!!! My issue with this purchase is the tube was 90% empty when it arrived! I would have to dig the wand down into the bottom corner to even lightly saturate the brush! Pretty bummed! I will absolutely use this product again, but unfortunately I won't be purchasing it from this seller. Pretty expensive empty bottle :(
customer_reviews.author: Tennille Turner

customer_reviews.title: NeuLash - Not same formula as before? It's very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and it worked. However, this time I have seen no improvement whatsoever. I'm very disappointed and would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why or how, but my lashes are now very long and actually curl by themselves. My lashes were okay before, but now they are so much more. I tried a less expensive product than did not work, so I went back to this one. Just know that it takes quite a while to see any difference, so don't get discouraged. Also, when the lashes that are longer fall out, the new ones will not be long unless you keep using the product. If you stop using it, you will just eventually go back to your original lashes.
customer_reviews.author: RNT

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for long, lush, lashes!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the eyelash enhances, and this is the best by far. It started working for me in about 3 weeks and my lashes grew to and have maintained about 1/2" of length. this product doesn't sting or discolor your eyelids like some others do. My 65 yr old mother loves this product as well. Yes, it is more expensive than some of the others, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Tonn

customer_reviews.title: The only one that works
customer_reviews.text: Neulash is expensive, but it really works! I have tried many other over the counter Eyelash enhancers, but none of them helped. Neulash takes time, but it made my lashes darker, longer, and thicker. People ask all the time if I have extensions or am wearing false lashes. I am allergic to mascara and this makes me look like I am wearing it. One other drawback besides the cost is that if you quit using it, your lashes go back to the way they were before. So happy I found something that works!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see so dramatic change, but indeed my lash has been restored after heavy use of fake lashes. I will keep using a bit more to see how it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: morimari3

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This product really works and lasts a long time. I use it probably every other night due to not remembering all the time, and I absolutely love the results. Not only are my lashes longer but they're curlier even! Very, very good buy. People are constantly complimenting my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Chellerella

customer_reviews.title: so for woking good
customer_reviews.text: It seems like woking good so far^^ I used only few days. Well you should try too. Thanks you very much
customer_reviews.author: min young kim

customer_reviews.title: Waiting
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Rapid Lash which works great, but I read that this one makes your eyelashes darker. I believe that I have seen a difference since I have been using this.
customer_reviews.author: gijane

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is amazing. I rarely take the time to write reviews on products anymore, but Neulash surprised me. I received it as a sample and in two weeks, I noticed a difference in the length and color of my eyelashes, so I purchased it. I have been using Neulash for two months now and love what it has done for my eyelashes. Putting on mascara takes much less time now.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen a change in my eyelashes. There was supposed to be a dramatic change. Disappointed. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my eyes began to turn red and I found I was allergic to something in the product and had to return it. There was absolutely no problem with Amazon taking the product back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Freter

customer_reviews.title: Everything was on time and it was very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used the eyelash enhancer before and liked it. I would order it again when and if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: carol long

customer_reviews.title: This one works. Not all do.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to b working pretty well . I've been using it for 3 weeks. My lashes are thicker and getting a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Hoffmaster

customer_reviews.title: I love NeuLash Eyelash Serum
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to apply and makes my lashes grow longer. I've been using this product for a couple of years and love it!
customer_reviews.author: jenny smith

customer_reviews.title: RIPOFF!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many products from Amazon and have always been happy, but I can't believe how I was taken with this product. I can't say how well the product works because there was hardly anything in it!! I paid $80 for something that I used 3 times and I can't even return it because I threw out the box and I am royally pissed off!!!
customer_reviews.author: nadia givargis

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not expecting much, but after four weeks, my eyelashes are already noticeably longer. I have sensitive skin and eyes, and thought it would bother me, but it hasn't at all. I'll definitely buy more after this tube is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Antebean

customer_reviews.title: The Eyelash Product on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best product on the market. If you see it out on Amazon, buy it. Have tried others without the result I get from this. No clumping, keeps eyelases healthy, full and strong. The price is outstanding, the in store price is 30%-40% more. 100% recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I could literally see the difference in just two weeks. Definitely will be buying this again and again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Barnett

customer_reviews.title: I prefer latisse
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get same results with Latisse. It's still working but not as well as latisse. if you don't mind to go to a doctor then go buy latisse. if you are too lazy or don't want to spend more buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Neulash Eyelash Technology
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for quite a few years. It really does help to keep your eyelashes strong and helps to prevent losing your eyelashes due to stress, etc. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Antenucci

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Used it faithfully for nearly four weeks and have not noticed ny difference. I will continue until bottle is finished but will not refill unless I see visible results.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Suda Woo

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product and decided to take the gamble. I have used Revitalash in the past but can't find it at a reasonable price on Amazon any more. I'll have to use this product for several more weeks to be able to give an accurate review.
customer_reviews.author: Buyers Champion

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I would appreciate a refund as this product did not work well at all. It is nothing like the prostaglandin analogs which actually do work, such as Latisse.
customer_reviews.author: O.P.D.

product_meta.title: Skin Research Laboratories NeuLash Enhancing Serum, Medium
product_meta.description:
neuLASH from Skin Research Laboratories is a nutrient-rich complex fortified with Active Eyelash Technology helping short, brittle, thin or sparse eyelashes achieve visible results— a luxurious, longer look in 30 days. Created with a proprietary combination of amino acids and bioengineered polypeptides to help strengthen and protect the lashes. Biotin, an essential B vitamin adds to this effect, fortifying lashes against further damage. Pumpkin seed extract helps lashes look more voluminous than ever. When lashes reach their full potential, a look of volume, length, curl and luster is revealed. Clinically proven safe, gentle and effective.

BRAND STORY
Skin Research Laboratories is committed to its mission of creating and developing leading-edge beauty treatments that deliver on their promise. No miracles. Just clinically-proven solutions.
